DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find risk factor hemorrhagic stroke , specifically intracerebral hemorrhage ( ICH ) , among Caucasians , African Americans , Hispanics .
DOC.criteria: All case must meet following eligibility criterion : 1 . Age 18 year great , fulfillment criterion intracerebral hemorrhage 2 . Resident least 6 month within 50 mile recruit center 3 . No evidence trauma , vascular malformation aneurysm , brain tumor cause hemorrhage 4 . Ability patient legal representative provide inform consent 1 . Malignancies lead coagulopathy 2 . Hemorrhagic transformation ischemic infarct 3 . Hemorrhage secondary dural venous sinus thrombosis
